translation: Arjuna said, "Having seen this Thy gentle human form, O Krishna, now I am composed and have been restored to my own nature."
commentary: 11.51 seeing having seen? This is this? Human human? form form? Your Thy? Soumyam gentle? Janardana O Krishna? Idanim now? I am (I) am? Sanvruttah composed? conscious with mind? prakritim to nature? gone restored.Commentary Arjuna says to Lord Krishna O Lord? I now behold Thy human form. Now my thoughts are collected and I am serene. I can speak. My senses perform their proper functions. My fear has vanished.
